fpmExplorer:Page.title: Table APIs
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Table building block enables you to extend the table using APIs.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Message Handling
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can add and remove messages using the APIs provided by the Table building block.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: No Data
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can add a custom illustrated message shown once the table shows no data using the APIs provided by the Table building block.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Presentation Variant
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can get and set the presentation variant of a table using the APIs provided by the Table building block.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Selection Variant
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can get and set the selection variant of a table using the APIs provided by the Table building block.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Variant Management
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can get the currently selected variant and change the variant of a table using the APIs provided by the Table building block.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Column Visibility
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can hide and show columns of a table using the APIs provided by the Table building block. Please note, this API is still experimental and may change in the future.
